Class PsyInput

java.lang.Object
coneforest.psylla.core.PsyInput
All Implemented Interfaces:
PsyCloseable, PsyObject, PsyReadable, PsyReady, PsyResetable
@Type("input") public class PsyInput extends Object implements PsyCloseable, PsyReadable, PsyReady, PsyResetable
The representation of input.

      public int read() throws PsyIOErrorException
      Description copied from interface: PsyReadable
      Reads a single character.
      Specified by:
      read in interface PsyReadable
      Returns:
      the character read, as an integer in the range 0 to 65535 (0x00–0xFFFF), or -1 if the end of the source has been reached.

      PsyIOErrorException - when an I/O error occurs.

    • psySkip

      public PsyInteger psySkip(PsyInteger oCount) throws PsyRangeCheckException, PsyIOErrorException
      Description copied from interface: PsyReadable
      Skips characters. This method will block until some characters are available, an I/O error occurs, or end of input is reached.
      Specified by:
      psySkip in interface PsyReadable
      Parameters:
      oCount - an integer representing the number of characters to be skipped.
      Returns:
      an integer representing the number of characters actually skipped.
      Throws:
      PsyIOErrorException - when I/O error occurs.
      PsyRangeCheckException
